metadata.title: CVE-2023-34256 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.description:
** DISPUTED ** An issue was discovered in the Linux kernel before 6.3.3.There is an out-of-bounds read in crc16 in lib/crc16.c when called fromfs/ext4/super.c because ext4_group_desc_csum does not properly check anoffset. NOTE: this is disputed by third parties because the kernel is notintended to defend against attackers with the stated "When modifying theblock device while it is mounted by the filesystem" access.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34256` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-4.4.0-252-generic - 4.4.0-252.286
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-252-generic - 4.4.0-252.286
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-252-lowlatency - 4.4.0-252.286
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.15.0-223-generic - 4.15.0-223.235~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-223-generic - 4.15.0-223.235~16.04.1
linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-223-lowlatency - 4.15.0-223.235~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1130-kvm - 4.4.0-1130.140
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1167-aws - 4.4.0-1167.182
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1166-aws - 4.15.0-1166.179~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1175-azure - 4.15.0-1175.190~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-4.4.0-1099-fips - 4.4.0-1099.106
linux-image-hmac-4.4.0-1099-fips - 4.4.0-1099.106
linux-image-unsigned-4.4.0-1099-fips - 4.4.0-1099.106
linux-image-unsigned-hmac-4.4.0-1099-fips - 4.4.0-1099.106
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1160-gcp - 4.15.0-1160.177~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

linux-image-unsigned-4.15.0-1129-oracle - 4.15.0-1129.140~16.04.1
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: linux package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-252.286').
linux-hwe package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-223.235~16.04.1').
linux-kvm package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1130.140').

linux-azure package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1175.190~16.04.1').
linux-fips package in fips-updates/xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.4.0-1099.106').
linux-gcp package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1160.177~16.04.1').
linux-gke: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-oracle package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.15.0-1129.140~16.04.1').
